org.eclipse.scada.da.server.exec.extractor

Class AbstractBaseExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.scada.da.server.exec.extractor.AbstractBaseExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extractor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractArrayExtractor, AbstractReturnCodeExtractor, PlainStreamExtractor

    public abstract class AbstractBaseExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Extractor
    The AbstractBaseExtractor class implements most of the stuff you need in order to implement a full extractor. Handling of item factory, error handling and destruction (unregistering) are handled for you.

      • doProcess

        protected abstract void doProcess(ExecutionResult result)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Process the execution result as input.

        This method will only be called if no execution error occurred. Otherwise the error flags of all data items are automatically set.

        This method must apply the attributes from fillNoError(Map) when updating items. This is needed since applying them afterwards would cause two updates on the dataitem and the state would by async to the value itself.

        Parameters:
        result - the execution result that has to be processes
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong

      • register

        public void register(Hive hive,
            FolderItemFactory folderItemFactory)
        Specified by:
        register in interface Extractor

      • unregister
